attributes.review: I opened the app to see something very horrifying and I can’t believe that this was allowed to be on the App Store. I now have to talk about it with my therapist from the emotional distress it caused me.🤭🤢😔
attributes.title: I’ll be contacting my lawyer😡

attributes.review: I was walking down the stairs to find my sister looking at a picture of a chicken nugget seems like nothings off right well no it was actually a picture of Donald trump I was mortified this app is awful!!
attributes.title: Um no 😡🙄

attributes.review: This app not promotes, but also emphasizes highly disrespectful and harmful content. This app is directly and aggressively attacking of the beliefs and ideas of others. It is abusive in its language and images.
attributes.title: Highly

attributes.review: Once the app was open I was met with pop ups and glitches that disturbed my searching making it impossible to use.
attributes.title: Garbage of an app

attributes.review: the MOMENT i downloaded this app, my phone stopped working entirely and i had to get a new phone. the app killed my parents and kidnapped my dog. if i could rate it 0 stars, i would ✨🧚🏻
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: i download the app and the first thing i see is a man with abnormally tiny hands. i assumed they were photoshopped but after a quick google search i realized that those are, in fact, the man’s real hands. i’m appalled that our children can see things like this without a warning or censor or anything.... bad examples for our children🤮🤮🤮 no need to shove it in our faces...
attributes.title: disgraceful...

attributes.review: This app disgusts me. ewwwww just no i almost passed away from seeing this app and sadly, my pet fish caught a glimpse and ended up tragically dying from the sight! View at your own risk, but i suggest not viewing at all!!!
attributes.title: just no

attributes.review:
I came here to support trump but all I ended up seeing when I opened the app was pictures of an oversized Cheeto.

I don’t understand why you would need an app to look at pictures of Cheetos.
And the last thing I want to see is a naked Cheeto.🤢
I suggest just going to google images for your snack needs. 

Overall pretty uninteresting unnecessary and basically traumatizing, not to mention suss.😳
attributes.title: Unnecessary🙄

attributes.review: Ummmmm. Garbage. I downloaded the app to see all the news on the best president ever and when I opened the app it glitched and then my phone blew up. Had to go buy a new one just so I could write this review.

This app is being used to promote a rapist, homophobic, transphobic, racist bigot who wants to be elected as president in 2020. It’s vile that Apple would even have this on their store when the person it is promoting is so vile. I’m disgusted.
attributes.title: Not at all what I was looking for
